name: Koro (Geass)
description:
Top down shooter where you only have 1 bullet and need to pick it up after every shot

Credit to https://www.FesliyanStudios.com for the background music

Made for Mini Jam 110

I may have forgotten about the jam so I started it in the second day 

Controls 

    move - WASD / keys

    aim  & shoot - mouse 

    go to menu - K 

Controls in menu

    change button - W D / up down ( keys )

    change option & press - D / space / enter
